relation: Migration of contacts and calendar data from KResource to Akonadi (Details)
Support for syncing the feed list with Google Reader
Add export of alarms to a new calendar file
Allow configuration of default deferral time interval
Accept drag-and-drop of Todo entries to create a new alarm
Show command execution error indication in alarm list
Add option to spread alarm windows across screen
A new Akonadi-based address book to replace KAddressbook
Create and port to akonadi model.
Add support for nepomuk including tagging, possibly storage, and linking. Also a nepomuk tag proxy model for representing the structure as tagged.
Create plasmoid capable of showing the entire tree, or a single book.
Save metadata about attachments to Nepomuk when saving them
Port old conduits to new base conduit architecture and KDE4/Qt4
Finish Keyring conduit, base conduit code and test cases, category syncing
Volker Krause, Kevin Krammer, Tobias Koenig
